name: BActionManager
desc: Creates and edits action buttons. If it signed a workflow enabled page, actions provide workflow operations defined on workflow definition.

infoArray.name: visibleHelpButton
infoArray.desc: Visibility of Help button. Default true

infoArray.name: visibleInfoButton
infoArray.desc: Visibility of Info button. Default true

infoArray.name: visibleOptionsButton
infoArray.desc: Visibility of Options button. Default true

infoArray.name: onActionClick
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when any action clicked.

infoArray.name: onHelpClick
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when the help button is clicked by the mouse.

infoArray.name: onInfoClick
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when the info button is clicked by the mouse.

infoArray.name: onOptionsClick
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when the options button is clicked by the mouse.

infoArray.name: onCloseClick
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when the close button is clicked by the mouse.
